title: Flex Queue unfair/uneven teams
body:
Just go rethink how to make this queue, teams are uneven (diam,plat vs gold silver isn't every fair and just wants to make people stop playing.
Keep a elo system that changes with the note you got playing with champs? 
Voice chat maybe? Anything to make queuing up fun. play ranked to get your ass handed to you and see that the elo between there and our team is like 2 divisions
I've been playing since season 2, thinking of stopping this game for good.
Fix this or many more will follow.
